SETTINGS_FEATURE.NO_DATA_TITLE: You need Merchants to build your eco-system!
SETTINGS_FEATURE.NO_DATA_TEXT: Let's begin by creating your first Merchant
SETTINGS_FEATURE.NAME: Name

ROLE_TYPES.ADMIN_DESCRIPTION: Has full access to the internal group settings provided by the Super Admin, can invite users to the group
ROLE_TYPES.CREATOR_DESCRIPTION: Has access to customer support features and view only
ROLE_TYPES.CUSTOMER_DESCRIPTION: Has access to create, update within the scope of module provided access to. Manager can launch campaigns
ROLE_TYPES.MANAGER_DESCRIPTION: Has access to create, update within the scope of modules provided access to. Creator may not launch campaigns
